TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HeaderedContentControl extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl
.class public auto ansi HeaderedContentControl extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl

summary.span: 为包含单项内容并具有标头的所有控件提供基实现。

span.span: Provides the base implementation for all controls that contain single content and have a header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 继承 属性，并定义 类型的 属性。 inherits the property from and defines the property that is of type . 提供控件的标题。 provides a heading for the control. 与 的 属性一样， 可以是任意类型。Like the property of a , the can be any type. 下图显示了两个从 继承的 对象。The following illustration shows two objects, which inherit from . 第一个 将 对象作为 和 中的内容： 设置为包含 和 的 ; 设置为包含 和 的 。The first has objects as the content in both the and the : the is set to a that contains an and a ; the is set to a that contains a and a . 第二个 的 设置为字符串， 设置为单个 。The of the second is set to a string and the is set to a single . ![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl")![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl") 标头属性中具有不同类型的 TabControlTabControl with different types in the Header property 具有有限的默认样式。A has a limited default style. 应用程序开发人员可以创建 ，但其外观非常简单。An application developer can create a , but its appearance will be very simple. 如果希望增强控件的外观，可以创建新的 。If you wish to enhance the appearance of the control, you can create a new . 可用于创建自定义控件，因为它为带有标题的单个内容控件提供模型。A is useful for creating custom controls because it provides a model for single content controls with headers. 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 "备注" 部分中显示的 。The following example shows how to create the shown in the Remarks section. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#16)] 下面的示例演示如何为 创建 。The following examples show how to create a for a . [!code-xaml[HeaderedContentControl#HeaderedContentControlStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headeredcontentcontrolstyle)] [!code-xaml[HeaderedContentControl#HeaderedContentControl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headeredcontentcontrol)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与 的 属性一样， 可以是任意类型。Like the property of a , the can be any type. 使用相同的逻辑来显示 中所述的 。The uses the same logic to display the that is described in . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个包含两个从 继承的 对象的 。The following example creates a that contains two objects, which inherit from . 第一个 将 对象作为 和 中的内容： 设置为包含 和 的 ; 设置为包含 和 的 。The first has objects as the content in both the and the : the is set to a that contains an and a ; the is set to a that contains a and a . 第二个 的 设置为字符串， 设置为单个 。The of the second is set to a string and the is set to a single . [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#16)] 下图显示了上一示例创建的 。The following illustration shows the created by the previous example. ![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl")![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl") 标头属性中具有不同类型的 TabControlTabControl with different types in the Header property 下面的示例创建两个 对象，以指定 的 和 的外观。The following example creates two objects to specify the appearance of the and of the . span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the property if it is displayed as a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是预定义的复合字符串格式。 can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format. 有关字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 如果设置了 的 或 属性，则会忽略 属性。If you set the or property of a , the property is ignored. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例将 绑定到 `Student` 对象的集合。The following example binds a to a collection of `Student` objects. `Student` 类具有一个 `Name` 属性和一个 `Course` 对象的集合，并实现 方法返回学生的 `Name` 或列出学生课程的字符串。The `Student` class has a `Name` property, a collection of `Course` objects, and implements the method to return either the `Name` of the student or a string that lists the student's courses. 该示例使用 将学生的名称放入每个 的 （继承自 ），并使用 在 的内容中显示每个学生的课程列表。The example uses to put a student's name in the of each (which inherits from ), and the to display the course list for each student in the Content of the . [!code-xaml[ContentStringSnippets#TabControl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#tabcontrol)] 下面的示例实现 方法，以返回学生的 `Name` 或列出学生课程的字符串。The following example implements the method to return either the `Name` of the student or a string that lists the student's courses. [!code-csharp[ContentStringSnippets#TabControlToString](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#tabcontroltostring)] [!code-vb[ContentStringSnippets#TabControlToString](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#tabcontroltostring)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于显示控件标头的内容的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template used to display the content of the control's header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`或 `DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *TemplateResourceKey**TemplateResourceKey* 标识所请求的模板的键。The key that identifies the template being requested. 该键引用 中的现有资源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 属性元素语法在技术上是可行的，但不建议这样做。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 请参阅[内联样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md). 使用或的绑定引用也是可能的，但情况并不常见。A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例创建两个 对象，以指定 的 和 的外观。The following example creates two objects to specify the appearance of the and of the . [!code-xaml[HeaderedContentControl#HeaderTemplate1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headertemplate1)] [!code-xaml[HeaderedContentControl#HeaderTemplate2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headertemplate2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个数据模板选择器，以提供自定义逻辑来选择用于显示标头的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets a data template selector that provides custom logic for choosing the template used to display the header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果同时设置了 "" 和 "" 属性，则将忽略模板选择器属性。If both the and the properties are set, the template selector property is ignored. ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation**MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* 一个派生自 的类，该类实现实际的 重写。A class derived from that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[WPF xaml 的 XAML 命名空间和命名空间映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`或 `DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey**DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* 标识所请求的选择器实现的键。The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested. 该键引用实现实际 重写的派生类。The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[WPF xaml 的 XAML 命名空间和命名空间映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). 还可以以编程方式将 类的实例作为资源添加到资源字典。You can also programmatically add an instance of your class as a resource to a resource dictionary. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
